jobDescription: Angaza creates software for selling life-changing products in underserved markets. Our core users live in emerging markets, and we believe they'll use our software to dramatically improve the daily lives of hundreds of millions of people over the next decade. This PositionAngaza is hiring a data scientist to drive feature development in the core product, used by businesses to manage affordable solar financing that benefits more than half a million families today.  Consider applying if you've worked professionally in a data science role for at least three years; or, your work is nominally in software engineering, but you can make a strong case for your data science background.Next StepThis position is full-time and on-site in our San Francisco office. Send us your contact details and résumé below. Feel free to attach any extra information you think we should know. We look at every single person. We'll get back to you shortly.
